mapper.select: /*嵌套对象*/ SELECT sk.phone, sk.goods_id, sk.state, sk.kill_time, kg.id "killGoods.id", kg.price "killGoods.price", kg.total_num "killGoods.totalNum", kg.goods_name "killGoods.goodsName", kg.start_time "killGoods.startTime", kg.end_time "killGoods.endTime", kg.create_time "killGoods.createTime" FROM success_kill_record sk INNER JOIN kill_goods kg on sk.goods_id=kg.id WHERE sk.phone=#{userPhone} AND sk.goods_id=#{goodsId};
